translation.en: [man 1] Don't be afraid to dream big.
translation.zh: 我们可以大胆畅想

translation.en: Doesn't matter where you come from.
translation.zh: 不论你来自何方

translation.en: You can show the world…
translation.zh: 你可以告诉这个世界

translation.en: nothing is impossible.
translation.zh: 凡事皆可能

translation.en: [man 2] There are only 14 mountains in the world higher than 8,000 meters.
translation.zh: 全球海拔超过八千米的高山仅14座

translation.en: The quest to climb these mountains is a story that goes back 100 years.
translation.zh: 人类攀越这些高山的历史可以追溯到一百年前

translation.en: [man 3] Above 8,000 meters in the death zone, it's a very high-stakes game.
translation.zh: 八千米以上的“死亡地带”非常危险

translation.en: The cold, the wind, avalanches.
translation.zh: 寒气、罡风、雪崩

translation.en: When a climber gets into trouble
translation.zh: 如果登山者遇到困难

translation.en: without other strong climbers around them to help,
translation.zh: 身边又没有强力的队友应援

translation.en: they're usually left to die.
translation.zh: 他们只能等待死神降临

translation.en: [man 2] In the history of high-altitude mountaineering,
translation.zh: 在高海拔登山运动的历史中

translation.en: there is no one respected more than Reinhold Messner.
translation.zh: 最受尊敬的莫过于莱茵霍尔德梅斯纳尔

translation.en: He was the first climber to summit all the fourteen 8,000-meter peaks.
translation.zh: 他是首位登顶所有14座海拔八千米高峰的登山者

translation.en: -It took him 16 years. -[people applauding]
translation.zh: 他花了16年完成这个壮举

translation.en: [Messner] Fear is always in you.
translation.zh: 人的内心总会有恐惧

translation.en: You have the feeling, "I am only safe if I'm back in base camp."
translation.zh: 你会觉得：“只有在营地里才安全

translation.en: "Back in civilization."
translation.zh: 回到人类文明中才安全”

translation.en: Climbing all the 8,000-meter peaks in one lifetime is very hard.
translation.zh: 在一生中 征服所有海拔八千米以上的高峰是十分困难的

translation.en: Normally, for a single eight-thousander, it's a major endeavor.
translation.zh: 对付一座八千米高峰 已然不易

translation.en: It's a huge two-month expedition just to climb one 8,000-meter peak.
translation.zh: 仅征服一座八千米高峰就是一场需要耗时两个月的大探险 （职业登山运动员 金国威）

translation.en: But sometime in the spring of 2019,
translation.zh: 而在2019年春天的某个时刻

translation.en: the mountaineering world started talking about this crazy guy from Nepal.
translation.zh: 登山界开始谈论起这位来自尼泊尔的疯狂小伙

translation.en: He was someone that nobody had ever heard of.
translation.zh: 之前从未有人听说过他

translation.en: Everyone was asking,
translation.zh: 每个人都在问

translation.en: "Who the hell is Nims Purja?"
translation.zh: “这个尼姆斯普贾究竟是谁？”

translation.en: All right, mate.
translation.zh: 好的 伙计

translation.en: [Nims] The fastest time to climb
translation.zh: 过去完成登顶全部14座八千米山峰的

translation.en: all the fourteen 8,000-meter peaks was seven years.
translation.zh: 过去完成登顶全部14座八千米山峰的 最快纪录是七年

translation.en: If I can stay alive, I can do this in seven months.
translation.zh: 而只要我活着我就能在七个月内完成 （尼玛尔“尼姆斯戴”普贾）

translation.en: This is about inspiring the human race.
translation.zh: 这是激励人类不断探险的精神

translation.en: The climbing community of Nepal
translation.zh: 尼泊尔登山爱好者

translation.en: have always been the pioneers of eight-thousanders,
translation.zh: 始终处于八千米以上登山的前沿

translation.en: but they never got the respect they deserve.
translation.zh: 但却从未得到应有的尊重

translation.en: I want to represent the Nepalese climbing community.
translation.zh: 我要代表尼泊尔登山者

translation.en: My mission was divided into three phases.
translation.zh: 我的登山任务分为三个阶段

translation.en: Phase 1 would be Nepal.
translation.zh: 第一阶段在尼泊尔境内

translation.en: I would need to be the first climber in history
translation.zh: （第一阶段 尼泊尔 4到5月） 我需要成为历史上首位

translation.en: to summit six 8,000-meter peaks in the spring season.
translation.zh: 在春季登顶六座八千米山峰的登山者

translation.en: Phase 2 would be in Pakistan,
translation.zh: 第二阶段将在巴基斯坦境内

translation.en: where I would need to summit K2,
translation.zh: 我需要在这阶段登顶乔戈里峰

translation.en: and you've got to be lucky to survive that mountain.
translation.zh: 只有幸运儿才能征服这座山峰

translation.en: And for Phase 3, I would need to get permission
translation.zh: 在第三阶段 我需要获得

translation.en: from the Chinese government to climb in Tibet.
translation.zh: 中国政府对于在西藏登山的许可

translation.en: I was told that my plan was impossible.
translation.zh: 我被告知我的计划是不可能实现的

translation.en: So I decided to name it Project Possible.
translation.zh: 所以我决定把它命名为“可能性计划”

translation.en: [woman] It was a crazy idea.
translation.zh: 这是个疯狂的想法

translation.en: But it wasn't a surprise to me.
translation.zh: 但对我来说却不足为奇

translation.en: He's constantly thinking… He's constantly thinking of something.
translation.zh: 他一直在思考 （苏琪普贾）

translation.en: I don't know what. But his brain doesn't rest at all.
translation.zh: 我不知道他在思考什么但他的大脑始终飞速运转

translation.en: [Nims] We got married when we were very young.
translation.zh: 我们很年轻时就结婚了

translation.en: For her to let me go and do this huge project…
translation.zh: 对她来说 能够放手让我去完成这个伟大的计划…

translation.en: Suchi is an amazing human.
translation.zh: 苏琪是个非常了不得的女人

translation.en: She's mentally super strong.
translation.zh: 她的精神超级强大

translation.en: [chuckling] Well, I understood the risk,
translation.zh: 我知道其中的风险

translation.en: uh, but I think it was in his character.
translation.zh: 但我认为冒险就是他的性格

translation.en: He's very driven.
translation.zh: 他上进心很强

translation.en: Finally!
translation.zh: 终于！

translation.en: Yeah, finally we're going to do it. Don't worry, I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 是的 我们终于要去执行了不要担心 我会没事的

translation.en: Make sure you look after yourself.
translation.zh: 要好好照顾自己

translation.en: [Suchi] It was so dangerous.
translation.zh: 这个计划太危险了

translation.en: But I knew it was gonna be life-changing for him.
translation.zh: 但我知道 这将改变他的人生

translation.en: [Nims] On this project, I will be supported by a team of Nepalese climbers,
translation.zh: 在这个计划中 我将有一个尼泊尔登山者团队做后盾

translation.en: who would climb with me
translation.zh: 他们将和我一起

translation.en: on different mountains throughout the expedition.
translation.zh: 在探险中登上各个山峰

translation.en: I have to trust these guys with my life.
translation.zh: 我必须全然信任他们 以命相托

translation.en: But I also knew that it was going to be fun.
translation.zh: 而同时我也知道探险途中将是一路欢歌

translation.en: Good morning, everybody, guys!
translation.zh: 伙计们 大家早上好！

translation.en: Project Possible team!
translation.zh: “可能性计划”团队！

translation.en: Mingma is the strongest climber I have ever met.
translation.zh: 明玛是我见过的最强壮的登山者 （明玛戴维）

translation.en: My right-hand man. Okay?
translation.zh: 我的得力助手

translation.en: [Mingma In Nepali] For me, mountaineering is all about exploring.
translation.zh: 对我来说 登山就是不断探索的过程

translation.en: [Nims in English] Geljen is the best dancer on the planet.
translation.zh: 盖尔詹是世界上最棒的舞者

translation.en: [Geljen in Nepali] Everyone in the team treats each other like brothers.
translation.zh: 团队中每个人之间都亲如兄弟

translation.en: We party together.
translation.zh: 我们欢聚在一起

translation.en: [Nims in English] Lakpa Dendi, he can carry the size of a house.
translation.zh: 拉克帕登迪他能搬起房子那么大的重物

translation.en: [Lakpa in Nepali] I had hope that if we all pulled together, it was possible.
translation.zh: 我相信 只要我们齐心协力就能实现计划

translation.en: This was a good thing for Nepal.
translation.zh: 这将为尼泊尔增光

translation.en: [in English] Here's my brother Gesman! Hey!
translation.zh: 这是我的兄弟盖斯曼！

translation.en: [Nims] Gesman, he is willing to put everything on the line.
translation.zh: 盖斯曼极具冒险精神

translation.en: [Gesman in Nepali] No one had ever attempted anything like Project Possible.
translation.zh: “可能性计划”是史无前例的

translation.en: We had to be part of this.
translation.zh: 我们必须为它贡献力量

translation.en: [man] The established way of behaving in mountaineering
translation.zh: 既定的登山行为方式

translation.en: is to be very humble and to understate one's goals.
translation.zh: 要求我们非常谦卑 弱化个人目标

translation.en: Nims is very much the opposite. He's very outspoken.
translation.zh: 尼姆斯恰恰相反 他非常坦率 （加内特麦迪逊）

translation.en: This is me, I got abdomen, but this gonna go away, you know.
translation.zh: 这就是我 我有小肚子但必须把它减掉

translation.en: [Madison] When he told me about Project Possible, it was just mind-boggling.
translation.zh: 当他向我提起“可能性计划”我感到非常不可思议

translation.en: You're dealing with weather windows,
translation.zh: 你要计划天气窗口期

translation.en: the logistics, the route conditions…
translation.zh: 物流运输 道路状况…

translation.en: and it's extremely dangerous.
translation.zh: 而且极为危险

translation.en: I thought, great ambition here, but not likely to succeed at all.
translation.zh: 我当时想 虽然听起来雄心壮志但基本上不可能成功

translation.en: [Nims] Sometimes you got to focus on something that's very important to you.
translation.zh: 有时必须拼尽全力去做你认为非常重要的事

translation.en: I'll make this happen.
translation.zh: 我会实现目标

translation.en: And it's going to go away for sure. Boom.
translation.zh: 我肯定能减掉小肚子 绝对的

translation.en: -[man laughing] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: It doesn't matter how many times you've been there
translation.zh: 你到过那里多少次并不重要 你看到它多少次也不重要

translation.en: and how many times you've seen it.
translation.zh: 你看到它多少次也不重要

translation.en: Your mind just can't comprehend how big Annapurna is.
translation.zh: （唐鲍伊） 你无法想象安纳布尔纳峰有多大

translation.en: It gives you this sense of going to battle
translation.zh: 它给你一种需要

translation.en: and you're going to fight something pretty mean.
translation.zh: 与极为恶劣环境搏斗的感觉

translation.en: For every three climbers that make it to the summit,
translation.zh: 每三位成功登顶的登山者中

translation.en: one dies trying.
translation.zh: 就有一位不幸身亡

translation.en: I'm Geljen Sherpa. I'm going to summit Annapurna.
translation.zh: 我是盖尔詹夏尔巴我将要登顶安纳布尔纳峰

translation.en: Hello! I'm Mingma David Sherpa.
translation.zh: 大家好！我是明玛戴维夏尔巴

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] I first came to hear about Nims through my uncle
translation.zh: 我是通过我叔叔初次听说尼姆斯的

translation.en: with whom he climbed his first mountain, Lobuche Peak.
translation.zh: 他和我叔叔一起攀登了罗布切峰那是他首次攀登的高海拔山峰

translation.en: I told Nims, "I will support you as a brother,
translation.zh: 我告诉尼姆斯“我作为兄弟 会全力支持你

translation.en: and I will give everything I can for the project."
translation.zh: 我会为这个计划付出我的一切”

translation.en: [Nims in English] I was leading the fixing team.
translation.zh: 我负责绳索固定团队

translation.en: You set the ropes, opening the route for others.
translation.zh: 我们固定绳索 为其他人开路

translation.en: This is what it takes to set fixed lines.
translation.zh: 这就是铺设固定绳索要付出的努力

translation.en: See how tired he is, my brother.
translation.zh: 看看他有多累 我的兄弟

translation.en: You know, and see the sun. It's been a struggle today.
translation.zh: （盖尔詹夏尔巴） 看看太阳 真是艰难的一天

translation.en: Don, my brother. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 唐 我的兄弟

translation.en: [Don] I was on Annapurna at the same time as Nims.
translation.zh: 我和尼姆斯一起登上了安纳布尔纳峰

translation.en: This is my friend Don,
translation.zh: 这是我的朋友唐

translation.en: trying to trailblaze on six feet of deep snow.
translation.zh: 他尝试在1点8米的深雪中开路

translation.en: I've made five different attempts
translation.zh: 我在13年间

translation.en: over 13 years to try to make it to the top of this mountain
translation.zh: 五次尝试登顶这座山

translation.en: and haven't been able to do it.
translation.zh: 都未能取得成功

translation.en: There is no other climb that I've ever been on
translation.zh: 在我攀登生涯中

translation.en: where the mountain is literally crumbling down on top of you.
translation.zh: 从未遇过这种情况大雪不停坍塌到身上

translation.en: It's terrifying.
translation.zh: 非常恐怖

translation.en: [Nims] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Don] You feel like you have no control.
translation.zh: 你觉得自己无法控制局面

translation.en: [Nims] Just in time.
translation.zh: 刚好躲过了

translation.en: Well, that's just off our shoulders.
translation.zh: 哇 跟我们擦肩而过

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] The weather was good,
translation.zh: 天气不错

translation.en: but because of the amount of fresh snowfall, it was really hard.
translation.zh: 但因为有大量新雪 攀登十分艰难

translation.en: [Nims in English] It's super deep.
translation.zh: 雪超级深

translation.en: Somewhere it's waist-deep.
translation.zh: 有的地方雪已齐腰

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] After fresh snowfall, there are frequent avalanches.
translation.zh: 新降大雪后 常常会有雪崩

translation.en: [Don in English] That was super tough.
translation.zh: 超级困难

translation.en: There was a point where I gave up,
translation.zh: 在某个时刻 我放弃了

translation.en: and I just said, "Nims, this is not going to work."
translation.zh: 我说：“尼姆斯 这是行不通的”

translation.en: Giving up is not in the blood, sir. It's not in the blood.
translation.zh: 我们的字典里没有放弃这个词 先生 绝不放弃

translation.en: [Don] That was the first daylight for me about his project.
translation.zh: 那是我对他的计划的第一个顿悟

translation.en: This guy believed that they were going to do it.
translation.zh: 他相信他们能做到

translation.en: And they pushed through.
translation.zh: 他们在努力向这一目标前进

translation.en: [Nims] Summit!
translation.zh: 登顶！

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: See that, man?
translation.zh: 看到了吗 哥们？

translation.en: [Don] I couldn't be prouder of this guy.
translation.zh: 我由衷地为他感到自豪

translation.en: Every time I was like, "Eh, man, things don't look like
translation.zh: 每次我都说：“看起来

translation.en: they're gonna go through on this, uh, Annapurna climb."
translation.zh: （唐鲍伊） 他们不能成功登顶安纳布尔纳峰“

translation.en: He's like, "I believe." Here we are standing on the summit.
translation.zh: 而他总是说：“我有信心”现在我们就站在了顶峰

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -Love that.
translation.zh: -太感谢你了-很欣赏这种精神

translation.en: Love you, brother. That means a lot to me.
translation.zh: 爱你 兄弟 这对我意义非凡

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Look at that view.
translation.zh: 看看这景色

translation.en: I was so happy at the summit.
translation.zh: 能够登顶 我太高兴了

translation.en: But I was like, "Well, Nims,
translation.zh: 但我说：“好 尼姆斯

translation.en: the clock starts now."
translation.zh: 现在只是开始”

translation.en: [Don] We came down from the summit, got to Camp 4, and slept that night.
translation.zh: 我们从顶峰下到4号营地当晚睡在那里

translation.en: In the morning, Nims poked his head inside the tent.
translation.zh: 早上 尼姆斯将头伸进帐篷

translation.en: He said, "We got a problem."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们遇到问题了

translation.en: "There's a climber from a different team, he didn't come down in the night."
translation.zh: 有个其他团队的登山者昨晚没有下来

translation.en: "He's still up there."
translation.zh: 他还在上面”

translation.en: There was a helicopter that was flying in to see where he was.
translation.zh: 有架直升飞机起飞去寻找他的位置

translation.en: This is a really morbid thing to say.
translation.zh: 这话说出来非常阴暗

translation.en: We were hoping that he had passed in the night.
translation.zh: 我们希望他在那天晚上已经去世了

translation.en: To consider that he had survived that long at that altitude,
translation.zh: 一想到他要在那么高的海拔并且没有氧气的情况下

translation.en: and without oxygen was a pretty horrific thought.
translation.zh: 坚持那么长的时间 想想就毛骨悚然

translation.en: He waved as we went by.
translation.zh: 当我们经过 他向我们招手

translation.en: I just started to cry.
translation.zh: 我开始哭泣

translation.en: [Nims] I thought, you know, "What if that was me?"
translation.zh: 我想：“如果那是我呢？”

translation.en: He was just gonna die in hope.
translation.zh: 他会在希望中煎熬死去

translation.en: So we made the decision that we had to help.
translation.zh: 所以我们决定施以援手

translation.en: Who's gonna be on the rescue team?
translation.zh: 谁要加入救援队？

translation.en: Me, Mingma, Gesman and Geljen.
translation.zh: 我、明玛、盖斯曼和盖尔詹

translation.en: [pilot] It's almost on the margins of the helicopter's limit.
translation.zh: 那几乎已经是直升飞机能够飞到的极限边缘

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] I've been a mountaineer for 10 years.
translation.zh: 我是一名拥有十年经验的登山运动员

translation.en: I've been involved in more than 100 rescues.
translation.zh: 我曾参与过一百次以上的救援活动

translation.en: [Geljen] We were tired and didn't have much energy.
translation.zh: 我们很疲倦 没有多少能量 （“可能性计划”团队盖尔詹夏尔巴）

translation.en: I was scared about how the helicopter
translation.zh: 我很害怕直升飞机

translation.en: would drop us from above. I was very nervous.
translation.zh: 把我们放下去的方式 我非常焦虑

translation.en: [Don in English] Bravery doesn't even remotely describe what those guys had to do to go back up.
translation.zh: 勇气一词远远不能形容这些小伙子做出的这个返回决定

translation.en: You finally summit one of the most dangerous mountains in the world,
translation.zh: 你终于征服了一座世界上最危险的山峰

translation.en: and now you gotta go back up there?
translation.zh: 而现在你要返回那里？

translation.en: It is a roll of the dice.
translation.zh: 这是一件纯靠运气的事情

translation.en: [Nims, muffled] Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！ （顶面 下午5点）

translation.en: Your friends are here, okay?
translation.zh: 你的朋友在这里 好吗？

translation.en: You go home now.
translation.zh: 你现在就能回家了

translation.en: Don't worry. Oxygen, oxygen, we'll give oxygen.
translation.zh: 不要担心 氧气 我们会给你氧气

translation.en: [in Nepali] Quick, quick!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [in English] Every second means a life to him.
translation.zh: 每提前一秒 他就多一分生机

translation.en: We knew that the helicopter couldn't come at night.
translation.zh: 我们知道直升飞机晚上不能飞来

translation.en: So, we had to get him down to Camp 4 as fast as possible.
translation.zh: 所以我们必须尽快把他带下去带到4号营地

translation.en: You're very strong!
translation.zh: 你非常坚强！

translation.en: We go home, okay?
translation.zh: 我们回家 好吗？

translation.en: [in Nepali] Gesman, make a pillow for him.
translation.zh: 盖斯曼 给他做一个枕头

translation.en: [in English] That night we just had to slap ourself to keep us awake,
translation.zh: 那晚我们不得不掌掴自己来保持清醒

translation.en: and we just took him down to Camp 3 at 6:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 早上6点我们就带他下撤到3号营地

translation.en: Only five minutes before the helicopter came.
translation.zh: 五分钟后直升飞机就到了

translation.en: [Don] I immediately went over and I put my hand on his neck.
translation.zh: 我立即过去 用我的手放在他的颈部

translation.en: He was alive and breathing, but barely.
translation.zh: 他还活着 在呼吸 但情况不容乐观

translation.en: [Nims] We had to get him to the hospital as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 我们必须尽快把他送到医院

translation.en: [Don] Those guys were really, really risking their lives.
translation.zh: 这些小伙子真的将自己的生命置之度外

translation.en: That is a testament to the character that they have.
translation.zh: 这证明了他们身上的闪光品质

translation.en: This is the house that I grew up as a kid.
translation.zh: 这是我孩提时代住过的房子

translation.en: -[in Nepali] Hello. Are you well? -Yes, we are.
translation.zh: -嗨 你们好吗？-我们挺好的

translation.en: [Nims in English] The security is very tight here.
translation.zh: 这里非常注重安全

translation.en: Mum used to lock this, you know,
translation.zh: 你知道 妈妈过去会在这上锁

translation.en: so there were no nights out and stuff. You know?
translation.zh: 所以晚上不能外出之类的

translation.en: Hello, hello! Mummy?
translation.zh: 嗨！妈妈？

translation.en: I was born in a poor family.
translation.zh: 我出生在一个贫穷的家庭

translation.en: My mum and dad gave everything for us.
translation.zh: 我的父母倾全力给予我们一切

translation.en: Hello, Mum. Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你好 谢谢您

translation.en: My mum wasn't a soft mum. She was tough for a reason.
translation.zh: 我的妈妈并不太温和不过她的强硬是有原因的

translation.en: I was always getting into trouble.
translation.zh: 我总是惹一堆麻烦

translation.en: There wasn't a single day where I wasn't beaten by the teacher.
translation.zh: 我没有一天不挨老师的揍

translation.en: [laughing] Because I was a naughty boy.
translation.zh: 因为我是个淘气的小孩

translation.en: [Kamal] Because he had three older brothers, he was very competitive.
translation.zh: 因为他有三个哥哥所以他好胜心很强

translation.en: He was a fighter.
translation.zh: 他是个斗士

translation.en: If there is any challenge, he wanted to face, and then he wanted to win.
translation.zh: 如果有任何挑战 他都会直接面对然后他会想方设法战胜挑战

translation.en: [Nims] Four years ago, my dad had a heart attack
translation.zh: 四年前 我的父亲突发心脏病

translation.en: which made him half-paralyzed.
translation.zh: 导致半身不遂

translation.en: He had been a Gurkha.
translation.zh: 他一直是典型的廓尔喀人

translation.en: [narrator] Considered one of the toughest fighting men in the world,
translation.zh: 廓尔喀军团被认为是世界上最坚韧的战斗部队之一

translation.en: Gurkha regiments have fought valiantly in the British army for many years.
translation.zh: 多年来在英国军队中以英勇善战而闻名

translation.en: [Nims] In Nepal, you had limited opportunities.
translation.zh: 在尼泊尔 机会有限

translation.en: Being a Gurkha meant you could travel the world.
translation.zh: 成为一名廓尔喀士兵就意味着有机会周游世界

translation.en: The Gurkhas are steeped in history,
translation.zh: 廓尔喀士兵的历史悠久

translation.en: and they're unique soldiers.
translation.zh: （军中同袍的叙述） 他们是独一无二的士兵

translation.en: The amount of effort that individuals
translation.zh: 他们每个人都付出巨大努力

translation.en: put into getting into the selection process is huge.
translation.zh: 才成为了其中的一员

translation.en: [man] Go!
translation.zh: 出发！

translation.en: [military colleague] So they've always had that additional layer of pride.
translation.zh: 他们始终都有着一份不一样的自豪

translation.en: [Nims] In early life, I always used to compete against other people.
translation.zh: 小时候 我总喜欢与其他人一较高下

translation.en: I never knew how to back off.
translation.zh: 我从不知道如何退一步

translation.en: [Nims] When I joined the Gurkhas, the biggest thing I learned
translation.zh: （廓尔喀训练营 2004年） 当我进入廓尔喀军团我学到最重要的事是

translation.en: was I have to compete against myself.
translation.zh: 我必须与自己竞争

translation.en: To be better than who I was yesterday.
translation.zh: 让今天的我比昨天更优秀

translation.en: My mum is in really ill health.
translation.zh: 我的妈妈身体十分不好

translation.en: She has to go to hospital twice a week.
translation.zh: 她每周都得去两次医院

translation.en: Me being the youngest son,
translation.zh: 作为家里最小的儿子

translation.en: I have always been Mum's boy.
translation.zh: 我一直是妈妈的心肝宝贝

translation.en: [Nims] I need her support
translation.zh: 我需要她的支持

translation.en: because this is the biggest challenge I have ever taken.
translation.zh: 因为这是我有生以来面对的最大挑战

translation.en: [Mum in Nepali] There is no one more special than you in this world, son.
translation.zh: 这个世界上 儿子你对我来说是最特别的

translation.en: Bless you.
translation.zh: 祝福你

translation.en: [Kamal] Nirmal was telling us,
translation.zh: 尼尔玛告诉我们

translation.en: "I want to climb to show Mum what your son can do because of you."
translation.zh: “我之所以登山 就是为让妈妈看到因为她 我能够创造怎样的奇迹”

translation.en: [Nims] What did I get from my mum?
translation.zh: 我从我的妈妈那里学到了什么呢？

translation.en: A lot, man. Yeah. A lot of things.
translation.zh: 学到了很多 是的 学到了很多东西

translation.en: Coming from Nepal, I knew that I had the best team in the world.
translation.zh: 尼泊尔出身的我知道我有世界上实力最强的团队

translation.en: I made sure they were paid more money
translation.zh: 我确保给他们的酬劳

translation.en: than they would get from a Western expedition.
translation.zh: 高于他们参加一次西方人探险所获得的报酬

translation.en: Climbing eight-thousanders is also a chance
translation.zh: 攀登八千米山峰 对他们来说

translation.en: for them to build their careers.
translation.zh: 也是一次开创职业生涯的机会

translation.en: [in Nepali] Nepali mountaineers have a long history of mountaineering,
translation.zh: （明玛戴维夏尔巴的叙述） 尼泊尔登山者有着悠久的登山历史

translation.en: but when it comes to taking the lead on the international platform,
translation.zh: 但就引领国际登山界而言

translation.en: we haven't been able to reach that level.
translation.zh: 我们还未能达到这个水平

translation.en: There is a big difference between climbing
translation.zh: 在登山方面 和外国登山者合作

translation.en: for a foreign mountaineer and a Nepali one.
translation.zh: 与和尼泊尔登山者合作之间存在着巨大差异

translation.en: We are immensely proud that our leader is Nepali.
translation.zh: 我们的队长是尼泊尔人对此我们非常自豪

translation.en: [Nims in English] We started making good progress,
translation.zh: 我们开始时进展非常顺利

translation.en: but in the distance, I could see a huge cloud cover coming towards us.
translation.zh: 但我可以看到 在远方有一大片云正向我们飘来

translation.en: We were carrying a really heavy pack.
translation.zh: 我们带着特别沉的物资

translation.en: We had to take our tent, oxygen tanks, the rope, everything.
translation.zh: 我们必须携带帐篷氧气瓶、绳索等等

translation.en: You got to question yourself. Are you doing the right thing?
translation.zh: 你会问自己 这么做是对的吗？

translation.en: [in Nepali] At that stage, we were climbing despite the fear.
translation.zh: 在那个阶段我们心怀恐惧但继续攀登

translation.en: One wrong move and we were gone. It was that kind of a situation.
translation.zh: 走错一步 我们就会死当时就是这样一个处境

translation.en: [Nims in English] I said to them, "Guys, this is my idea."
translation.zh: 我对他们说：“伙计们 这是我的主意

translation.en: "If you feel like it's stupid and if you feel like you're gonna die,
translation.zh: 如果你认为这很愚蠢如果你感觉你就要死了

translation.en: you don't have to come with me."
translation.zh: 你就不必跟着我”

translation.en: But they kept going.
translation.zh: 但他们一直跟随

translation.en: We left for the summit push at 9:00 p.m.
translation.zh: 我们晚上9点出发 向顶峰发起冲锋

translation.en: Hoping that we would summit the next morning.
translation.zh: 希望我们能在第二天早晨登顶

translation.en: We summitted around 6:00 p.m. the next day.
translation.zh: 我们实际是在第二天下午6点左右完成的登顶

translation.en: It took 21 hours.
translation.zh: 一共用了21个小时

translation.en: One of the hardest things I have ever done.
translation.zh: 我曾完成的最艰难的事之一

translation.en: Oh, man. Pure by force today.
translation.zh: 伙计 今天纯靠力量

translation.en: If the team were not equally good, no summit.
translation.zh: 如果团队实力不够强的话肯定就无法登顶了

translation.en: Very tired today.
translation.zh: 今天非常累

translation.en: -Yeah, summit day! -[Geljen] Yup.
translation.zh: -耶 今天登顶了！-是的

translation.en: He doesn't drink normally. So thanks, man.
translation.zh: 他一般不喝酒 所以谢谢你 伙计

translation.en: -What a day! -[Geljen] What a day, yeah.
translation.zh: -多好的一天啊！-是啊 多好的一天

translation.en: [Nims] After serving six years with the Gurkhas,
translation.zh: 在廓尔喀军团服役六年后

translation.en: I decided to apply for the UK Special Forces.
translation.zh: 我决定申请加入英国特种部队

translation.en: [Suchi] That was the first time I saw him working towards his goal.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次看到他朝着自己的目标努力

translation.en: And how crazy he is.
translation.zh: 以及他是多么的疯狂

translation.en: He used to wake up 2:00 or 3:00 in the morning,
translation.zh: 他通常凌晨2点或3点起床

translation.en: run for 20 kilometers,
translation.zh: 跑步20公里

translation.en: carrying 75 pounds on his back.
translation.zh: 并负重34公斤

translation.en: Work all day, and then he would be off to the gym.
translation.zh: 全天工作后 他会再去健身房

translation.en: He wouldn't be back until 11:00.
translation.zh: 直到晚上11点 他才会回家

translation.en: That's how it was for six months.
translation.zh: 这种生活持续了六个月

translation.en: [Nims] I became the first Gurkha in history
translation.zh: 我成为历史上第一个

translation.en: to be selected for the Special Boat Service.
translation.zh: 被选入英国特别舟艇中队的廓尔喀人

translation.en: Being in the Special Forces representing Nepal, wow!
translation.zh: 代表尼泊尔加入特种部队 哇！
一千、两千、四千五千、六千、八千！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: I learned quickly, whatever the situation is,
translation.zh: 我很快发现 无论身处什么环境

translation.en: you have to stay in control.
translation.zh: 都必须保持控制

translation.en: I'm going to have to cut away.
translation.zh: 我要释放主伞了

translation.en: The whole experience gave me confidence to take on massive challenges.
translation.zh: 这些经历让我有自信应对巨大挑战

translation.en: But in 2011…
I was in a gun battle.
translation.zh: 我参加了一次枪战

translation.en: I was on a rooftop, providing fire support.
translation.zh: 我在屋顶上 提供火力支援

translation.en: All of a sudden…
translation.zh: 突然

translation.en: I'm falling through the air.
translation.zh: 我从空中坠落

translation.en: I hit the ground.
translation.zh: 我跌到地上

translation.en: I thought I had been shot in the face.
translation.zh: 我以为自己脸部中弹了

translation.en: It was a sniper aiming for my neck.
translation.zh: 那个狙击手瞄准的是我的脖子

translation.en: But luckily, the bullet hit the extender of my weapon.
translation.zh: 但幸运的是子弹击中了我的枪托扩展器

translation.en: And the gun saved my life.
translation.zh: 我的枪救了我的命

translation.en: A couple of centimeters either way,
translation.zh: 只要偏上几厘米

translation.en: that's the difference between life and death.
translation.zh: 就是生死之别

translation.en: [Suchi] My friends ask, "How do you do all of this?"
translation.zh: 我的朋友们问我：“你是怎么做到的？”

translation.en: My answer is always, "If I am constantly worrying about him,
translation.zh: 我的答案始终是“如果我一直为他焦虑

translation.en: then it's not going to do any good to me."
translation.zh: 也不会对我有任何帮助”

translation.en: I would break down.
translation.zh: 我会崩溃的

translation.en: You have to be strong.
translation.zh: 你必须变得强大

translation.en: I've never wanted to deviate him from his dream or his goals.
translation.zh: 我永远不会要求他背离他的梦想或目标

translation.en: He knew what he wanted to do in life.
translation.zh: 他知道他的人生追求

translation.en: People today, if you ask them, "Why you go to the high peaks?"
translation.zh: 如果你问现在的人“为什么你去攀登高峰？”

translation.en: They say, "Because it's fun." I don't believe them. It's not fun.
translation.zh: 他们会回答：“因为很有趣”我不相信他们 这并不有趣

translation.en: It's a place where you have to learn to cope with pain because it's painful.
translation.zh: 那是你必须学会应对痛苦的地方因为那里很痛苦

translation.en: [Nims] Eight o'clock in the morning, we reach base camp.
translation.zh: 早上8点钟 我们抵达大本营

translation.en: Helicopter fly to Kathmandu yesterday. Party. No sleep.
translation.zh: 我们昨天乘直升飞机飞到加德满都我们彻夜派对 没有睡觉

translation.en: -Project Possible. -Project Possible, brother.
translation.zh: -可能性计划-可能性计划 兄弟

translation.en: [Nims] After we summitted Dhaulagiri, we had been partying in Kathmandu.
translation.zh: 我们登顶道拉吉利峰后在加德满都派对庆祝

translation.en: I was struggling a bit, and I was hungover.
translation.zh: 我有点难受 我宿醉未醒

translation.en: Most people climb this mountain in stages.
translation.zh: 大多数人分阶段攀登这座山峰

translation.en: They go to Camp 1. They'll sleep over there.
translation.zh: 他们先到1号营地 在那里过夜休息

translation.en: Camp 2, sleep over there.
translation.zh: 然后到2号营地 在那里过夜休息

translation.en: Camp 3, Camp 4, and then to the summit.
translation.zh: 接下来是3号营地 4号营地最后再登顶

translation.en: Because of the weather window, we had to climb in one day.
translation.zh: 因为天气窗口期我们必须一天就完成攀登

translation.en: [Chin] For Nims to climb Kanchenjunga
translation.zh: 尼姆斯将一鼓作气攀登干城章嘉峰

translation.en: in a single push from base camp to the summit
translation.zh: 从大本营直至登顶

translation.en: while hungover is, uh… [laughing] I mean…
translation.zh: 而且在宿醉未醒的状态下我的意思是

translation.en: I don't know what to think of that.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么看待这件事

translation.en: It's completely absurd.
translation.zh: 这有悖常理

translation.en: [Nims] Now, we are here at Camp 2.
translation.zh: 现在我们到了2号营地

translation.en: The plan is to go and hit the summit directly.
translation.zh: 计划是继续攀登 直接登顶

translation.en: So we won't be sleeping.
translation.zh: 所以我们不会睡觉

translation.en: [Chin] Expeditions to 8,000-meter peaks take a huge toll on your body.
translation.zh: 八千米山峰探险对人的身体有巨大损害

translation.en: Once you get above 8,000 meters,
translation.zh: 一旦超过八千米

translation.en: you're in what is called the death zone.
translation.zh: 就踏入了所谓死亡地带

translation.en: You're breathing about a third of the amount of oxygen
translation.zh: 你呼吸时的含氧量只是

translation.en: you're normally breathing at sea level.
translation.zh: 海平面正常呼吸时的三分之一

translation.en: The biggest danger of climbing with oxygen is,
translation.zh: 携带氧气爬山的最大危险是

translation.en: you become dependent on it.
translation.zh: 你会变得依赖氧气

translation.en: If you run out,
translation.zh: 如果氧气用尽

translation.en: your body is in an environment that it's not adapted to.
translation.zh: 那么你的身体会无法适应那个环境

translation.en: Imagine not being able to breathe.
translation.zh: 想象一下无法呼吸的情景

translation.en: Bloody hell.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Yeah, we summitted one of the best mountain in the world.
translation.zh: 是的 我们登顶了世界上最棒的山峰之一

translation.en: I'm doing some crazy stuff.
translation.zh: 我做了一些疯狂的事

translation.en: Look… [exhales] I got nothing more to give.
translation.zh: 看 我已经尽了全力了

translation.en: Bye-bye, Kanchenjunga.
translation.zh: 再见 干城章嘉峰

translation.en: One hundred meters below the summit,
translation.zh: 在顶峰下一百米

translation.en: we found another climber completely messed up.
translation.zh: 我们发现了另一位登山者状况非常糟糕

translation.en: He had run out of oxygen.
translation.zh: 他的氧气用尽了

translation.en: [Nims] Be strong. We'll go home.
translation.zh: 振作起来 我们要回家了

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] We need to get to Camp 4 now.
translation.zh: 我们现在需要去4号营地

translation.en: [Nims in English] Go, go. Go.
translation.zh: 走

translation.en: When you come off the oxygen at that altitude,
translation.zh: 如果在那个海拔高度没有了氧气

translation.en: it is extremely dangerous.
translation.zh: 是极端危险的

translation.en: But without oxygen, you'll never be able to survive this.
translation.zh: 没有了氧气 你就无法活下去

translation.en: In the military, I have never left anyone behind.
translation.zh: 在军队中 我从未丢下过任何人不管

translation.en: I wasn't gonna do that on the mountains.
translation.zh: 在山上我也不会对任何人置之不顾

translation.en: So we gave the climber our oxygen.
translation.zh: 所以我们把我们的氧气瓶给了这位登山者

translation.en: And we made the radio contact on all the camps saying,
translation.zh: 我们用无线电联系所有营地求救

translation.en: "Hey, guys, we need help."
translation.zh: “伙计们 我们需要帮助”

translation.en: There were a lot of climbers at Camp 4,
translation.zh: 4号营地有很多登山者

translation.en: and I said, "Look, just bring the oxygen."
translation.zh: 我说：“只需要带上来一些氧气”

translation.en: [base camp in Nepali] I'm trying to contact them, but no one is picking up the radio.
translation.zh: 我尝试联系他们但没有人应答我的无线电求救

translation.en: [Mingma] The wind is getting stronger and his oxygen is almost finished.
translation.zh: 风更大了 他的氧气几乎用完了

translation.en: [base camp on radio] Don't risk your life. Come down now.
translation.zh: 不要冒生命危险 立刻下来

translation.en: [Nims] It's not in my blood to leave a person behind.
translation.zh: 我绝不会丢下一个人不管

translation.en: [Nims in English] The climber was massively struggling,
translation.zh: 那位登山者在苦苦挣扎

translation.en: but I can't see any head torches coming towards us for help.
translation.zh: 而我没有看到任何人来帮助我们

translation.en: -[Nims] Does anybody have oxygen? -[Mingma] There's no more oxygen.
translation.zh: -有人有氧气吗？-没有氧气了

translation.en: [Nims] There's no oxygen left.
translation.zh: 氧气已用尽

translation.en: [Mingma] Nims, brother…
translation.zh: 尼姆斯 兄弟…

translation.en: If we stay any longer, we'll die as well.
translation.zh: 如果我们再停留下去 我们也会死的

translation.en: [Nims] What can I do, brother? No one has come to help.
translation.zh: 我还能做什么 兄弟？没人来帮忙

translation.en: [in English] Brother…
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: I was told people were coming.
translation.zh: 我被告知有人正在前来帮忙

translation.en: Brother…
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: I was told so many times.
translation.zh: 我听到太多次了

translation.en: Oh my God. No one is coming.
translation.zh: 我的上帝 根本没有人来

translation.en: [Suchi] I was at home and my phone rings.
translation.zh: 我当时正在家里 我的电话响了

translation.en: I could hear Nims' voice.
translation.zh: 我可以听到尼姆斯的声音

translation.en: And my heart sank.
translation.zh: 我的心沉了下去

translation.en: He said, "He died in my arms."
translation.zh: 他说：“他死在了我的臂弯中

translation.en: "Nobody came to help us."
translation.zh: 没有人来帮助我们”

translation.en: It was really scary.
translation.zh: 这真是相当恐怖

translation.en: He's got such a big project.
translation.zh: 他在进行一个如此宏大的计划

translation.en: But he will always be the first person to offer help to anyone.
translation.zh: 但他始终是向他人率先伸出援手的人

translation.en: [Nims] I was making my way down.
translation.zh: 我开始下山

translation.en: Mingma and Gesman were far ahead of me.
translation.zh: 明玛和盖斯曼远在我的前面

translation.en: I had been off oxygen for more than 11 hours.
translation.zh: 我已经超过11个小时没有吸氧了

translation.en: I started developing HACE.
translation.zh: 我开始出现HACE症状

translation.en: [narrator] Can mere man overcome the relentless forces of nature?
translation.zh: 只靠人力能战胜无情的大自然吗？

translation.en: [Nims] HACE is high-altitude cerebral edema.
translation.zh: HACE即高海拔脑水肿

translation.en: You can't control your movements.
translation.zh: 你无法控制自己的动作

translation.en: [narrator] Can they contend with altitude that robs a man of energy and will power,
translation.zh: 他们能否战胜夺走人的能量和意志力的高海拔

translation.en: and makes him move in a slow-motion dream?
translation.zh: 在慢动作梦境般的环境中继续前行？

translation.en: [Nims] I don't have enough power. I don't have enough strength.
translation.zh: 我没有足够的能量 没有足够的体力

translation.en: I just felt helpless.
translation.zh: 我感到十分无助

translation.en: I was scared, to be honest.
translation.zh: 老实说 我被吓到了

translation.en: I needed to get down the mountain quickly.
translation.zh: 我需要快速下山

translation.en: It's a matter of life and death.
translation.zh: 这关乎生死

translation.en: Suddenly, I started to lose control.
translation.zh: 突然 我开始失控

translation.en: I saw a huge figure standing tall.
translation.zh: 我看到一个巨大的身影高高站立着

translation.en: A big monster with the hair of a Yeti.
translation.zh: 一个有着雪人毛发的大怪物

translation.en: If I don't do something, I'm going to be dead.
translation.zh: 如果我再不做些什么 我就要死了

translation.en: I said, "Hey, can you hear me?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你能听到我说话吗？”

translation.en: He's like, "Help."
translation.zh: 他说：“救命”

translation.en: "Help."
translation.zh: “救命”

translation.en: He was a climber who was lost.
translation.zh: 那是一位迷路的登山者

translation.en: He had HACE as well.
translation.zh: 他也出现了HACE症状

translation.en: I had to gather all my energy and resources to help him down to Camp 4.
translation.zh: 我必须调动所有能量和资源帮他下到4号营地

translation.en: I was mentally and physically drained.
translation.zh: 我耗尽了精神和体力

translation.en: For the first time, I started to question my plan.
translation.zh: 我第一次开始质疑我的计划

translation.en: I didn't set foot on the mountains until 2012.
translation.zh: 在2012年前 我没有登过山

translation.en: That's when I realized
translation.zh: 那时我意识到

translation.en: how strong a climber I was.
translation.zh: （道拉吉利峰 2014年） 我是多么强壮的登山者 （珠穆朗玛峰 2016年）

translation.en: I just fell in love with the physical and mental challenge.
translation.zh: 我爱上了登山带来的体力和精神挑战

translation.en: [Barber] We're here today, testing Nims' ability
translation.zh: 我们今天在这里测试尼姆斯

translation.en: to get through three minutes at 6,000 meters while cycling
translation.zh: 我们今天在这里测试尼姆斯 在海拔六千米骑行三分钟的能力

translation.en: to see how his body reacts to a lack of oxygen
translation.zh: 在海拔六千米骑行三分钟的能力 了解他的身体如何应对缺氧情况

translation.en: whilst also making decisions quickly and accurately.
translation.zh: 以及是否能快速准确地作出各种决策

translation.en: For context, we've had world-record, ultra-endurance cyclists
translation.zh: 说明一下 我们测过拥有世界纪录且耐力超高的自行车手

translation.en: who've only been able to manage about 90 seconds
translation.zh: 他们仅能坚持大约九十秒

translation.en: before we've had to cancel the test.
translation.zh: 之后我们不得不取消了测试

translation.en: Keep going, Nims. One… One more minute to go.
translation.zh: 继续 尼姆斯 还剩下一分钟

translation.en: [Nims] Physically, I believe I have a natural gift.
translation.zh: 我相信我的身体是大自然的馈赠

translation.en: I can climb with no sleep or rest at all.
translation.zh: 我爬山完全不需要睡觉或休息

translation.en: It doesn't matter how extreme the challenge is.
translation.zh: 无论是怎样的极限挑战

translation.en: I'm not going to give up.
translation.zh: 我都不会放弃

translation.en: [Barber] Last ten seconds. Try and get through this one.
translation.zh: 最后十秒 尝试完成这个

translation.en: Last ten seconds.
translation.zh: 最后十秒

translation.en: Five, three, two, one. And stop there. Relax there, relax there. Stop there.
translation.zh: 五、三、二、一 停在这放松一下 就此打住

translation.en: [Barber] We can't underestimate how strong it is
translation.zh: 我们不要低估他的强壮程度

translation.en: that he was able to get through the three minutes.
translation.zh: 他能完成这三分钟的测试

translation.en: His physiology means he's got more oxygen available to him
translation.zh: 他的生理机能让他能够获得更多氧气

translation.en: for physical work by the muscles,
translation.zh: 以便用肌肉进行体力活动

translation.en: and also for decision-making to use his brain.
translation.zh: 以及用大脑作出决策

translation.en: Which means he's able to operate at a far higher level.
translation.zh: 这意味着他的身体精神活动能够达到更高水准

translation.en: This is your blood-oxygen saturation here.
translation.zh: 这是你的血氧饱和度

translation.en: -[Nims] Yeah. -In the blue. What's interesting…
translation.zh: -是的-在蓝色区 有趣的是…

translation.en: I've not seen better results than Nims'.
translation.zh: 我还未见过测试结果比尼姆斯好的人

translation.en: [Nims] Have you done yours?
translation.zh: 你测试过吗？

translation.en: -Have I done mine? -[Nims] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我测试过吗？-是的

translation.en: Yes. [laughing]
translation.zh: 测试过

translation.en: -[Nims] How is it? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: -Not like that. [laughs] -Not like that? Good then, awesome.
translation.zh: -不像那样-不像那样？好 很好

translation.en: [Kamal] He came to my house.
translation.zh: 他来到我的住所

translation.en: He said he wanted to leave the Army.
translation.zh: 他说他要离开军队

translation.en: I said, "Nirmal, no. You cannot do this."
translation.zh: 我说：“尼尔玛 不 你不能这样做”

translation.en: Mum was very seriously ill,
translation.zh: 妈妈病得非常严重

translation.en: and Nirmal is the biggest financial asset for the family.
translation.zh: 尼尔玛是我们家最重要的经济来源

translation.en: He had just six years left in the Army.
translation.zh: 他只需在军队继续服役六年

translation.en: I said to him, "Make sure you get the pension,
translation.zh: 我对他说：“确保你能拿到养老金

translation.en: then afterwards, whatever you want to do, we do not stop you."
translation.zh: 在那之后 无论你要做什么我们都不会阻拦你”

translation.en: But he doesn't listen to me.
translation.zh: 但他不听我的

translation.en: And he quit the Army.
translation.zh: 他离开了军队

translation.en: We had a bitter row.
translation.zh: 我们发生了激烈的争吵

translation.en: I didn't talk to him for three months.
translation.zh: 我和他三个月都没说一句话

translation.en: [Nims] For my family, it was very uncertain.
translation.zh: 对我的家庭来说这带来了巨大的不确定性

translation.en: Normally, the youngest son look after their parents in Nepal.
translation.zh: 在尼泊尔一般是最小的儿子照顾父母

translation.en: But climbing eight-thousanders had become my passion.
translation.zh: 但征服所有八千米高峰已成为我的梦想

translation.en: I wanted to show the world what a human can do.
translation.zh: 我要向全世界展示人类能够做到的成就

translation.en: [Kamal] I said, "Waste of time."
translation.zh: 我说：“这浪费时间

translation.en: "Waste of money."
translation.zh: 浪费金钱”

translation.en: I said to him, "You're only thinking of yourself."
translation.zh: 我对他说：“你只想着自己

translation.en: "You don't think about your family, how we feel."
translation.zh: 你不想想你的家庭不考虑我们的感受”

translation.en: I love my brother so very much.
translation.zh: 我非常爱我的弟弟

translation.en: I don't want my brother to die.
translation.zh: 我不想我弟弟去送死

translation.en: [Suchi] There was no funding.
translation.zh: 没有资金

translation.en: And we only had a few months to raise the money.
translation.zh: 我们只有几个月的时间去筹钱

translation.en: In the Nepalese culture, you give.
translation.zh: 尼泊尔文化注重付出

translation.en: So asking for money was one of the toughest things he's done.
translation.zh: 所以去要钱 （可能性计划14座山峰/7个月） 是他完成的最艰难的事情之一

translation.en: When he was approaching potential sponsors,
translation.zh: 当他接触有可能提供赞助的人时

translation.en: he basically sounded like a lunatic.
translation.zh: 他基本上听起来就像个疯子

translation.en: The project will prove the power of possible.
translation.zh: 该计划将证实可能性的力量

translation.en: The amount he needed was huge.
translation.zh: 他需要的金额是巨大的

translation.en: But nobody believed he could do it.
translation.zh: 但没有人相信他能够完成这一计划

translation.en: Thank you all for being here.
translation.zh: 感谢各位光临

translation.en: All he was getting was disappointment.
translation.zh: 他收获到的只有失望

translation.en: [man over phone] I'm in awe of your desire to want to do it,
translation.zh: 我很敬畏你想要完成此计划的愿望

translation.en: but there hasn't been any money forthcoming.
translation.zh: 但我们并没有收到任何资金

translation.en: It's not investable.
translation.zh: 它没有投资前景

translation.en: [Suchi] It was time to make a decision how we're going to do this.
translation.zh: 现在需要决定我们该如何完成此计划

translation.en: Nims gets this idea.
translation.zh: 尼姆斯想到了一个主意

translation.en: The idea was to remortgage the house.
translation.zh: 这个主意就是将房子二次抵押

translation.en: Everything was on the line.
translation.zh: 我们押上了一切

translation.en: But I believed in him.
translation.zh: 但我相信他

translation.en: [Nims] I'd only summited three mountains.
translation.zh: 我只完成了三座山的登顶

translation.en: My next target,
translation.zh: 我的下一个目标

translation.en: the highest mountain in the world.
translation.zh: 是世界的最高峰

translation.en: [Nims] On Everest, the mountain is run by the Sherpas.
translation.zh: 在珠峰 山是由夏尔巴人管理的

translation.en: They work so hard to support the Westerners.
translation.zh: 他们非常努力地工作为西方登山者提供支持

translation.en: They take a massive risk.
translation.zh: 他们冒着巨大的风险

translation.en: Without their support, there wouldn't be a climbing season.
translation.zh: 没有他们的支持就没有登山季

translation.en: [Chin] The guided route on Mount Everest in the spring
translation.zh: 春季珠峰上有向导带领的路线

translation.en: is pretty far removed from anything else in mountaineering.
translation.zh: 和其它任何登山路径都截然不同

translation.en: There are literally hundreds of climbers trying to get to the top.
translation.zh: 有上百名登山者都尝试登顶

translation.en: You clip into a fixed line that has been set by Sherpas.
translation.zh: 你紧抓着夏尔巴人铺设的固定绳索

translation.en: And it's a highway up to the summit.
translation.zh: 它就是到达顶峰的高速公路

translation.en: [Nims] I knew that there were loads of people on the mountain,
translation.zh: 我知道山上有很多人

translation.en: I was wary of that. But I also knew that I had the speed.
translation.zh: 我非常了解这一点但我也知道我的速度很快

translation.en: [climber] Here's to the mission, Everest, and Lhotse, and Makalu.
translation.zh: 我们要完成以下登顶任务珠峰、洛子峰和马卡鲁峰

translation.en: -[Nims] Thank you, brother. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 兄弟-干杯

translation.en: -Oh my God! -Oh my!
translation.zh: -哦 我的天啊！-哎呀！

translation.en: For you! Only for you!
translation.zh: 为你！只为你！

translation.en: [Nims] I wasn't planning on just climbing Everest.
translation.zh: 我的计划并不只是攀登珠峰

translation.en: I wanted to climb Everest, Lhotse, and Makalu,
translation.zh: 我要攀登珠峰、洛子峰和马卡鲁峰

translation.en: the world's first, fourth,
translation.zh: 在48小时内完成世界第一、第四

translation.en: and fifth highest mountains within 48 hours.
translation.zh: 和第五高峰的登顶

translation.en: No one has ever done that before.
translation.zh: 以前从未有人这样做过

translation.en: We overtook 95% of the people on the way up.
translation.zh: 在登山途中 我们超过了95%的人

translation.en: We summited quite early in the morning around 5:30.
translation.zh: 我们在一大清早5点半左右 完成了登顶

translation.en: On the summit…
translation.zh: 在峰顶…

translation.en: your soul becomes part of the mountain.
translation.zh: 你的灵魂会变成大山的一部分

translation.en: It makes you feel alive.
translation.zh: 这会让你觉得自己充满活力

translation.en: [Madison] Spring 2019 Everest was a perfect storm.
translation.zh: 2019年春天 珠峰上危机重重 （朋友兼高海拔登山者加内特麦迪逊的叙述）

translation.en: There was a weather window, but only for May 22nd and May 23rd.
translation.zh: 当时是有窗口期但只有5月22日和23日两天

translation.en: So you've got 400 climbers, plus another 400 Sherpas,
translation.zh: 所以 400名登山者再加上400名夏尔巴人

translation.en: all planning their summit attempts, in this two-day weather window.
translation.zh: 都计划在这两天的窗口期内尝试登顶

translation.en: [Nims in Nepali] No one is moving at all.
translation.zh: 登山线路上完全无法移动

translation.en: Hey, boys, what are you trying to do?
translation.zh: 嘿 哥们 你们打算做些什么？

translation.en: [in English] The queue was so intense.
translation.zh: 登山队伍中 人员如此密集

translation.en: People were fighting who needs to have the priority over going up or going down.
translation.zh: 人们相互争斗来抢夺谁能优先上山或下山

translation.en: [in Nepali] These guys, man.
translation.zh: 这些人啊 哥们

translation.en: [in English] We started to descend down.
translation.zh: 我们开始下山了

translation.en: I look back
translation.zh: 我回头看去

translation.en: and took a picture.
translation.zh: 拍了张照片

translation.en: I posted the photo online.
translation.zh: 我将这张照片发布到网上

translation.en: It went viral around the world.
translation.zh: 它很快在全球传播开来

translation.en: [reporter 1] On the way to the top of the world…
translation.zh: 在通往世界之巅的路上…

translation.en: [in German] Traffic jam on Mount Everest.
translation.zh: （珠峰交通阻塞）

translation.en: Look at this, 300 climbers queuing to make the summit.
translation.zh: 快看 300名登山者排队登顶

translation.en: [reporter 2 in French] A single file on the roof of the world.
translation.zh: 在世界屋脊上排成一队

translation.en: [reporter 1] The astonishing photo was taken by Nims Purja.
translation.zh: 这张令人震惊的照片是由尼姆斯普贾拍摄的

translation.en: Hundreds of climbers…
translation.zh: 数百位登山者…

translation.en: [Nims] Things just went absolutely crazy.
translation.zh: 事情变得相当疯狂

translation.en: But I was so focused. Bring it on.
translation.zh: 但我相当专注 放马过来吧

translation.en: In the death zone, I come alive.
translation.zh: 在死亡地带 我活了下来

translation.en: Yeah, brother. No messing around!
translation.zh: 是的 兄弟 别再胡闹了！ （可能性计划：29天洛子峰峰顶 19年5月22日）

translation.en: Everest, Lhotse, and Makalu in 48 hours.
translation.zh: 在48小时内登顶珠峰、洛子峰和马卡鲁峰

translation.en: The new world record.
translation.zh: 新的世界纪录诞生了

translation.en: It's been epic.
translation.zh: 这具有划时代意义

translation.en: I know many people didn't believe me when I started,
translation.zh: 我知道 当我刚开始这个计划时很多人不相信我

translation.en: but I'm here right on top of Makalu,
translation.zh: 而当我站在马卡鲁峰峰顶

translation.en: and it ends the first phase of Project Possible.
translation.zh: 就宣告了“可能性计划”的第一阶段已顺利完成

translation.en: Hello, Mummy.
translation.zh: 妈妈您好

translation.en: [Mum in Nepali] How many mountains have you climbed?
translation.zh: 你已经登上了多少座高山了？

translation.en: Six.
translation.zh: 六座了

translation.en: I've climbed Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, Kanchenjunga,
translation.zh: 我已经征服了安纳布尔纳峰道拉吉利峰、干城章嘉峰

translation.en: Mount Everest, Lhotse, and Makalu.
translation.zh: 珠峰、洛子峰和马卡鲁峰

translation.en: How many left to climb?
translation.zh: 还要再爬多少座山？

translation.en: Still eight mountains to go.
translation.zh: 还有八座山

translation.en: [in English] When it comes to Mother, she's our heart.
translation.zh: 我们的妈妈对我们来说是最重要的 （哥哥卡玛尔普贾的叙述）

translation.en: But we don't know how long she's going to be here with us.
translation.zh: 但我们不知道她还能陪我们多久

translation.en: [in Nepali] I asked where my son is, and they showed me your video.
translation.zh: 我问我的儿子在哪里他们给我看了你的视频

translation.en: You were in the mountains, and you were breathing heavily.
translation.zh: 你在山上 大口地喘着气

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: [Kamal laughing] Yeah. I got really scared.
translation.zh: 我真的吓坏了

translation.en: [Kamal in English] Nirmal is so close to Mum,
translation.zh: 尼尔玛和妈妈关系非常亲近

translation.en: but she was obviously very worried because he wanted to climb.
translation.zh: 因为他要去爬山 妈妈明显非常担心

translation.en: [in Nepali] Why are you crying, Mother?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你为什么哭泣？

translation.en: Don't cry, Mother.
translation.zh: 别哭了 妈妈

translation.en: I am doing good work.
translation.zh: 我做的这件事是特别好的事

translation.en: The world is learning so many things.
translation.zh: 这个世界正在了解许多的事

translation.en: This is for Nepal and all the Nepalese.
translation.zh: 这是为了尼泊尔和全体尼泊尔人民

translation.en: [narrator] Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay set foot where man has before.
translation.zh: 埃德蒙希拉里和丹增诺尔盖登上了人类之前从未踏足之地

translation.en: They join history's greatest adventurers.
translation.zh: 他们跻身历史上最伟大的冒险家之列

translation.en: They conquered unconquerable Mount Everest.
translation.zh: 他们征服了不可征服的珠穆朗玛峰

translation.en: [Nims] Tenzing Norgay climbing Everest was a huge thing.
translation.zh: 丹增诺尔盖登上珠峰是一件大事

translation.en: [narrator] How did Tenzing feel up there on top of the world?
translation.zh: 站在世界之巅 丹增感觉如何？

translation.en: [interpreter] He's very happy.
translation.zh: 他非常高兴

translation.en: [Nims] So many Western climbers have climbed with a huge help from the Sherpa.
translation.zh: 有如此多的西方登山者在登山时得到了夏尔巴人的巨大帮助

translation.en: What I have heard most of the time is, "My Sherpa helped me." And that's it.
translation.zh: 我听到最多的话就是“我的夏尔巴帮助了我” 仅此而已

translation.en: That is wrong because he has a name.
translation.zh: 这种说法其实是错误的因为夏尔巴人有自己的姓名

translation.en: What they should be saying is Mingma David helped me.
translation.zh: 他们应该这样说是明玛戴维帮助了我

translation.en: That's Mingma trying to find the old ropes.
translation.zh: 明玛尝试寻找旧绳索

translation.en: Snow is too deep, right, brother?
translation.zh: 雪太深了 是吧 兄弟？

translation.en: Or, "Gesman Tamang helped me."
translation.zh: 或者说：“盖斯曼塔芒帮助了我”

translation.en: Me and my brother Gesman, uh, we set up the fixed lines.
translation.zh: 我和我的兄弟盖斯曼一起铺设固定绳索

translation.en: And now we're just going to head back to base camp.
translation.zh: 现在我们要返回大本营

translation.en: Yes, brother.
translation.zh: 是的 兄弟

translation.en: [Nims] If not, you are a ghost.
translation.zh: 要不是有他们登山者就会有性命之忧

translation.en: Nims representing this new generation
translation.zh: 尼姆斯代表了新的一代人

translation.en: of underappreciated and under-recognized Nepali climbers
translation.zh: 不受重视且被世人低估的尼泊尔登山者

translation.en: is totally exciting.
translation.zh: 这一点令人激动

translation.en: This is their moment.
translation.zh: 这是他们的时刻

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 是的！

translation.en: [Nims] If every Nepalese climber and people from the poor background
translation.zh: 如果每个尼泊尔登山者和贫困家庭的人

translation.en: see me doing this project,
translation.zh: 看到我做这个计划

translation.en: they would be like, "I could be that guy."
translation.zh: 他们就会想：“我也可以像他那样”

translation.en: [Chin] Pakistan's 8,000-meter peaks
translation.zh: 巴基斯坦境内八千米以上的山峰

translation.en: are some of the most inaccessible and difficult in the world.
translation.zh: 属于世界上最难攀登最难征服的山峰

translation.en: First you have Nanga Parbat, the Killer Mountain,
translation.zh: 首先是南迦帕尔巴特峰别称“杀人峰”

translation.en: which has claimed the lives of so many climbers.
translation.zh: 已经夺去了太多登山者的生命

translation.en: Then you head into the Karakoram.
translation.zh: 接下来要攀登喀喇昆仑山

translation.en: Gasherbrum I, Gasherbrum II,
translation.zh: 加舒尔布鲁木I峰和II峰

translation.en: Broad Peak.
translation.zh: 布洛阿特峰

translation.en: And then you have K2, which has a notorious reputation.
translation.zh: 最后将要征服的是乔戈里峰以环境恶劣而闻名

translation.en: [Nims in Nepali] All right, boys, keep coming down.
translation.zh: 好的 伙计们 继续下山

translation.en: [climber] How will we come back up here later like this?
translation.zh: 照这个情况 晚些时候我们怎么能回到这里？

translation.en: [Nims laughing] This guy nearly died by slipping away, the bastard.
translation.zh: 他在山上打滑 差点死了 这个家伙

translation.en: Shit! My legs are shaking, Mingma.
translation.zh: 见鬼！ 我的腿在颤抖 明玛

translation.en: [Nims] It's really dangerous, right?
translation.zh: 真是太危险了 是吧？

translation.en: My hands and fingers are freezing using the camera.
translation.zh: 因为在使用照相机我的手和手指都冻僵了

translation.en: [in English] Today, it's snowing quite heavily.
translation.zh: 今天雪下得非常大

translation.en: So I just made the call that we're gonna camp up here.
translation.zh: 所以我决定在这里扎营

translation.en: If the weather clears up, we're gonna go head up.
translation.zh: 如果天气放晴 我们就可以前行

translation.en: [climber] Kinshofer Wall. It's very technical.
translation.zh: 金沙夫墙 需要很高的技术

translation.en: [in Nepali] If you fall from here, you'll fall all the way down.
translation.zh: 如果从这跌落就会一直摔下去

translation.en: [Nims] That's right, it's very dangerous.
translation.zh: 确实如此 非常危险

translation.en: [in English] I always say to myself, "I'm not gonna die today."
translation.zh: 我总是告诉自己：“我今天不会死的

translation.en: "Maybe tomorrow, but not today."
translation.zh: 也许明天会死 但今天不会”

translation.en: The mountain doesn't say you are Black,
translation.zh: 山峰不会分辨你是黑人

translation.en: you are white,
translation.zh: 还是白人

translation.en: you're weak, you're strong.
translation.zh: 是瘦弱还是强壮

translation.en: It's one rule for everybody.
translation.zh: 它以同一条原则对待所有人

translation.en: If you give up… you die.
translation.zh: 如果放弃 就会死亡

translation.en: The next day, I was climbing back down to base camp.
translation.zh: 第二天 我下山返回大本营

translation.en: Suddenly I slipped.
translation.zh: 突然我滑倒了

translation.en: I was going faster, tumbling down.
translation.zh: 我的速度越来越快 向下滚落

translation.en: I lose the full control.
translation.zh: 我完全失去了控制

translation.en: But then, I saw a rope.
translation.zh: 但那时 我看到了一条绳索

translation.en: I have to grab this.
translation.zh: 我必须抓住它

translation.en: So I used all my strength. I just went boom!
translation.zh: 所以我用尽全身力量我就“砰”地一下！

translation.en: I hold on to it for dear life.
translation.zh: 我死死地抓住了它

translation.en: I had fallen around 100 meters.
translation.zh: 我已下坠了大约100米

translation.en: Not today, Nims. Not today.
translation.zh: 今天不会死的 尼姆斯 今天不会

translation.en: It was a horrible experience, mate.
translation.zh: 这是个恐怖的经历 哥们

translation.en: It shook my confidence massively.
translation.zh: 它极大地动摇了我的信心

translation.en: As a leader, the team have to have faith in you
translation.zh: 作为队长 整个团队都必须相信你

translation.en: to make the right decision.
translation.zh: 能够做出正确的决定

translation.en: Sometimes you have to hide your weakness.
translation.zh: 有时你必须隐藏自己的脆弱

translation.en: There were moments when I was struggling, but nobody saw that.
translation.zh: 有一些时刻我心里非常挣扎但没有人会看到

translation.en: Here we are!
translation.zh: 我们到啦！

translation.en: The day is absolutely beautiful today, and it's quite stunning.
translation.zh: 今天的天气绝佳 景色之美令人惊叹

translation.en: [Chin] In the world of mountaineering,
translation.zh: 在登山界

translation.en: the way in which you climb the mountain matters.
translation.zh: 爬山的方式很重要

translation.en: The absolute purists believes that climbing 8,000-meter peaks
translation.zh: 绝对纯粹主义者认为八千米高峰的攀登

translation.en: should be done full Alpine style,
translation.zh: 应该完全采用阿尔卑斯方式

translation.en: which means no use of oxygen.
translation.zh: 即无氧攀登

translation.en: It's a constant debate.
translation.zh: 这个问题一直被广为讨论

translation.en: Nims' team is climbing in the hybrid style,
translation.zh: 尼姆斯的团队攀登时采用混合方式

translation.en: where they're using oxygen above 8,000 meters.
translation.zh: 当超过八千米时吸氧攀登

translation.en: They're often putting in the fixed lines to the summit,
translation.zh: 他们常常铺设固定绳索 直到山顶

translation.en: and they're carrying all their own climbing equipment,
translation.zh: 携带自己的所有登山装备

translation.en: so they're totally self-sufficient.
translation.zh: 所以他们完全自给自足

translation.en: [Nims] People saying that it's so easy to climb with oxygen.
translation.zh: 有人说吸氧登山太容易了

translation.en: That is bullshit.
translation.zh: 那纯粹是胡说

translation.en: The other mountaineers were basically waiting for us
translation.zh: 其他登山者基本上都是等着我们为他们固定绳索

translation.en: to fix the ropes for them, and they could just follow.
translation.zh: 其他登山者基本上都是等着我们为他们固定绳索 他们只需要跟在我们后面

translation.en: It is so much easier.
translation.zh: 那样容易得多

translation.en: [Gesman] Hi, guys!
translation.zh: 嗨 伙计们！

translation.en: -Summit! Congratulations! -[Gesman] Summit, Nims! Congratulations!
translation.zh: -登顶！恭喜！-登顶 尼姆斯！恭喜！

translation.en: [Chin] Reinhold Messner climbed all fourteen 8,000-meter peaks
translation.zh: 莱茵霍尔德梅斯纳尔完成了全部14座八千米山峰的登顶

translation.en: without the support of oxygen.
translation.zh: 他采用的是无氧攀登方式

translation.en: But this took him 16 years.
translation.zh: 但他用了16年才完成这一创举

translation.en: [Messner] Some climbers criticized Nirmal, but I did not understand why.
translation.zh: 有一些登山者批评指责尼尔玛但我不理解为什么

translation.en: He was doing it in this way,
translation.zh: 他如果不采用这种方式

translation.en: otherwise it's not possible in such a short time.
translation.zh: 就不可能在如此短的时间内完成这个计划

translation.en: I like people that do and not chat.
translation.zh: 我喜欢多实干不闲聊的人

translation.en: You have to be willing to try.
translation.zh: 你必须愿意尝试

translation.en: Trying means also, you have a chance to fail.
translation.zh: 尝试也意味着你有可能失败

translation.en: In terms of Pakistan, we've completed Nanga Parbat,
translation.zh: 在巴基斯坦境内我们已完成南迦帕尔巴特峰

translation.en: G1, G2, and what is left to complete the second phase
translation.zh: 加舒尔布鲁木I峰和II峰的登顶第二阶段还有待完成的

translation.en: is Broad Peak and K2 right behind over there.
translation.zh: 是布洛阿特峰和乔戈里峰它们就坐落在那边

translation.en: I like watching the faces of other climbers
translation.zh: 我喜欢观察其他登山者

translation.en: when they get their first glimpse of K2.
translation.zh: 第一眼看到乔戈里峰时的表情

translation.en: You see this monumental pyramid of stone.
translation.zh: 你会看到乔戈里峰就像超大的石头金字塔

translation.en: You know the thought that's going through their head is,
translation.zh: 你知道这些登山者脑海里都会出现这么一个想法

translation.en: "This is a really bad idea."
translation.zh: “真不该来这儿”

translation.en: [Madison] Before Nims arrived, we had really struggled on K2.
translation.zh: （加内特麦迪逊的叙述） 在尼姆斯抵达前我们已在艰难地攀登乔戈里峰

translation.en: There were actually three avalanches
translation.zh: 实际上有三场雪崩

translation.en: where climbers were swept down the mountain.
translation.zh: 把登山者冲了下山

translation.en: We, along with all the other teams, made the decision to turn back.
translation.zh: 我们和其他所有团队都做出了返回的决定

translation.en: [woman] It was my third attempt of K2.
translation.zh: 这是我第三次尝试登顶乔戈里峰

translation.en: We were all thinking,
translation.zh: 我们都在想

translation.en: "You have to respect the mountain. Sometimes it doesn't want you up there."
translation.zh: “人必须尊重山有时它不想让人们上去

translation.en: "And you need to turn around and go back."
translation.zh: 你需要转身返回”

translation.en: The atmosphere was super depressive.
translation.zh: （乔戈里峰大本营） 气氛超级压抑

translation.en: But then, something happened.
translation.zh: 但后来 发生了一件事

translation.en: -[Nims] Hello! How are you? -Hello. How are you?
translation.zh: -嗨 你好吗？-嗨 你好吗？

translation.en: [Nims] Yes, I'm really good.
translation.zh: 是的 我相当不错

translation.en: -Nice meeting you. -Nice to meet you too.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-也很高兴见到你

translation.en: [Nims] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Uh, we went to Camp 4 and come back.
translation.zh: 我们去了4号营地又回来了

translation.en: -No problem. We are here now. -[all laugh] Project Possible is here. Okay?
translation.zh: 没问题 现在我们来了“可能性计划”来了

translation.en: When I arrived at the base camp, those mountaineers were stressed out.
translation.zh: 当我到达大本营时那些登山者心力交瘁

translation.en: -Yeah. So, as a friend… Okay? -Oh! Here's the thing.
translation.zh: 是的 这是朋友的馈赠 好吗？ 这是好东西

translation.en: [Nims] So I started to do a big wild party, mate.
translation.zh: 我开始举办一个盛大狂野的派对

translation.en: -Cheers, brother! -Ah, cheers!
translation.zh: 干杯 兄弟！

translation.en: [Klára] This is the thing that distinguishes him and his team from the others.
translation.zh: 这件事就可以看出他及他的团队与其他人的区别

translation.en: He don't give a damn what other people do or what they think.
translation.zh: 不必在乎其他人怎么想或怎么做

translation.en: Tonight we drink, tomorrow we plan! -Cheers! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 今晚我们欢聚畅饮明天再计划！干杯！

translation.en: [Klára] You're going to make it happen.
translation.zh: 计划一定能实现的

translation.en: -Guys, one life, yeah? We live it. -[man] Yeah! Yeah!
translation.zh: -哥们 我们只有一次生命-是的！

translation.en: Early morning tomorrow, we're going to be heading towards Camp 2, then Camp 4.
translation.zh: 明天大清早 我们就出发先到2号营地 再到4号营地

translation.en: And our plan is to set up the fixing lines by at least, you know, 1200 hours.
translation.zh: 我们的计划是最晚在中午12点之前把绳索固定好

translation.en: The climbers who had tried to summit, they didn't want to go back up.
translation.zh: 已经尝试过登顶的登山者不想再攀登

translation.en: I can see fear in their eyes.
translation.zh: 我在他们的眼睛里看到了恐惧

translation.en: The people are giving up because three people were in an avalanche.
translation.zh: 因为有三个人在雪崩中丧生所以人们纷纷放弃

translation.en: [Nims] Yeah, I got that.
translation.zh: 是的 我理解

translation.en: And this condition does not change in the last five days.
translation.zh: 这种天气状况一直持续了五天没变

translation.en: [Nims] Well, we'll go and see.
translation.zh: 我们要去看看

translation.en: Nims, you're a great boy, and this is lovely propaganda,
translation.zh: 尼姆斯 你很了不起你的计划也是很不错的宣传

translation.en: but you don't change the mountain.
translation.zh: 但你没法改变山峰

translation.en: Of course, I never said that I'm gonna change the mountain.
translation.zh: 当然 我从没说过我要改变山峰

translation.en: As a leader, you've got to present yourself
translation.zh: 作为队长 你必须表现出对自己

translation.en: with so, so much confidence.
translation.zh: 有足够的自信

translation.en: I've been coming from mountain to mountain,
translation.zh: 我一直在不停地登山

translation.en: and sometimes you feel like you're fucked,
translation.zh: 有时你感觉你完蛋了

translation.en: but when you say you are actually fucked, you are only like about 45% fucked.
translation.zh: 但实际上 当你说完蛋了糟糕的程度可能只有大概45%

translation.en: A lot of people have turned around, right?
translation.zh: 很多人已经返回了 不是吗？

translation.en: A lot of people have failed.
translation.zh: 很多人失败了

translation.en: We have to unite, and we have to go together.
translation.zh: 我们必须团结起来 一起登山

translation.en: [Klára] There was this friend of mine, very experienced mountaineer,
translation.zh: 我的这位朋友经验非常丰富的登山者

translation.en: saying, "Klára, it's 50% chance we make it,
translation.zh: 说道：“卡拉拉我们有50%的机会成功

translation.en: and it's 50% chance we die."
translation.zh: 也有50%的机会死去”

translation.en: And hearing that as a woman and as a mother of two children,
translation.zh: 听到这个 作为一名女性两个孩子的妈妈

translation.en: I'm thinking, "What the hell am I doing here?"
translation.zh: 我想：“我为什么要来这里？”

translation.en: But then Nims said, "Don't listen to the others."
translation.zh: 但随后尼姆斯说：“不要听其他人的

translation.en: "You need to take chances, and you need to take the risk sometimes
translation.zh: 你需要把握机会有时你也需要承担风险

translation.en: in order to make things happen for yourself."
translation.zh: 才能成功达到自己的预期”

translation.en: That was the moment when I realized, "Damn it."
translation.zh: 在那一刻 我意识到：“该死的

translation.en: "I will blame myself for the rest of my life
translation.zh: 如果我不再试一次

translation.en: if I don't give it one more try."
translation.zh: 我会一辈子责备自己的”

translation.en: [Madison] Above Camp 4 on K2,
translation.zh: 在乔戈里峰的4号营地上方

translation.en: there's the Bottleneck section which is considered the crux of the route.
translation.zh: 有个“瓶颈”路段被认为是这条路线上最难攀登的路段

translation.en: There's a giant overhanging ice cliff just above it called the serac.
translation.zh: （海拔：8200米） 在该路段上方悬有巨大的冰崖称为冰塔林

translation.en: This wall of hanging ice sometimes releases and sweeps
translation.zh: 这个悬冰川有时会泄下

translation.en: all the way down to base camp.
translation.zh: 一路冲下 直到大本营

translation.en: You could have your whole team swept away.
translation.zh: 你的整个团队都可能被冲走

translation.en: We thought there's no chance anyone will summit K2 this season,
translation.zh: 我们认为没有人能在这个季节登顶乔戈里峰

translation.en: but Nims had so much riding on this project,
translation.zh: 但尼姆斯非常想完成这个计划

translation.en: he was ready to go up there and risk his life
translation.zh: 他准备上去 冒着生命危险

translation.en: and give it his best shot.
translation.zh: 尽最大努力登顶这座山峰

translation.en: [Nims] A lot of people had tried to set the fixed lines
translation.zh: 很多人曾尝试在白天围绕“瓶颈”路段

translation.en: just around the Bottleneck in the daylight,
translation.zh: 铺设固定绳索

translation.en: but that's an avalanche prone area.
translation.zh: 但那是雪崩易发地区

translation.en: My plan is to be on that part
translation.zh: 我的计划是

translation.en: where everybody had given up exactly at one o'clock at night.
translation.zh: 在半夜1点踏上这个让所有人放弃的路段

translation.en: The snow will be like concrete.
translation.zh: 那时雪会凝结

translation.en: This was the first time where I had doubted my ability
translation.zh: 这是第一次我对自己的能力不太自信

translation.en: because everyone had given up.
translation.zh: 因为所有人都放弃了

translation.en: But the biggest strength I have is, I have no fear.
translation.zh: 但我的最大优势在于 我没有恐惧

translation.en: I'm gonna go up there
translation.zh: 我将上到那里

translation.en: and make my own assessment.
translation.zh: 自己进行评估

translation.en: Today Camp 2.
translation.zh: 今天到2号营地

translation.en: Tomorrow, Camp 4. Next day, summit.
translation.zh: 明天到4号营地 后天登顶

translation.en: [Messner] Most of us are forgetting that from the beginning of our life…
translation.zh: 大多数人都忘记了一件事那就是从一生下来

translation.en: we are approaching death.
translation.zh: 我们就在迈向死亡

translation.en: Life is absurd…
translation.zh: 生活是荒诞的

translation.en: but you can fill it with ideas.
translation.zh: 但你可以为生活注入奇思妙想

translation.en: With enthusiasm.
translation.zh: 为生活注入热情

translation.en: You can fill your life with joy.
translation.zh: 为生活注入乐趣

translation.en: [Nims] When you are in the mountains, you find out who you really are.
translation.zh: 你登山时 会了解到自己到底是谁

translation.en: Any mistake I make, it could be death.
translation.zh: 任何错误都可能导致死亡

translation.en: And when it comes to that moment…
translation.zh: 当那个时刻来临

translation.en: you want to survive.
translation.zh: 你想活下来

translation.en: You want to live.
translation.zh: 你要活下来

translation.en: I climb so I can live every moment of my life.
translation.zh: 我选择爬山 这样我可以真正活过我生命中的每个时刻

translation.en: [Messner] In such a concentrated situation,
translation.zh: 在这样一个需要全神贯注的环境中

translation.en: climbing and meditation is the same.
translation.zh: 登山和冥想是一样的

translation.en: When the pain is really forcing you to go down…
translation.zh: 当痛苦来袭 真的想要下山时

translation.en: you keep going up.
translation.zh: 你要继续上山

translation.en: You are really on the edge of possibilities.
translation.zh: 你面临各种可能性

translation.en: The edge of life and death.
translation.zh: 处于生死边缘

translation.en: Today, five of us, all the Nepalese mountaineers,
translation.zh: 今天 我们五个人全部都是尼泊尔登山者 我们完成了登顶

translation.en: made it to the summit.
translation.zh: 我们完成了登顶

translation.en: And we made it not only for us, we made it for everybody.
translation.zh: 我们登顶不仅是为了我们自己更是为了每个人

translation.en: [Madison] To go through the Bottleneck commands respect.
translation.zh: 顺利通过“瓶颈”路段确实值得敬仰

translation.en: But on top of that,
translation.zh: 此外

translation.en: a lot of people summited following in his footsteps.
translation.zh: 很多人跟随他的足迹 实现了登顶

translation.en: Nice photo.
translation.zh: 好水

translation.en: [Nims] Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: [Klára] The conditions on the mountain did change.
translation.zh: 乔戈里峰的登山条件确实变了

translation.en: [in Czech] We did it.
translation.zh: 我们做到了

translation.en: [in English] Twenty-four climbers reached the top in two days.
translation.zh: 之后的两天 有24名登山者登顶 （卡拉拉克劳赫娃）

translation.en: It was Nims and his team that made it possible.
translation.zh: 是尼姆斯和他的团队使这一切成为可能

translation.en: Good, good.
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: -Congratulations. -[Nims] Thank you.
translation.zh: -恭喜-谢谢

translation.en: Congratulations, eh.
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: Welcome to base camp.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到大本营

translation.en: Congratulations. Welcome to base camp.
translation.zh: 恭喜 欢迎来到大本营

translation.en: [in Nepali] I have climbed a lot of mountains in my life,
translation.zh: （拉克帕登迪夏尔巴的叙述） 我一生中攀登过很多山峰

translation.en: but this is my best moment.
translation.zh: 但这绝对是我的高光时刻

translation.en: So many people had told us we couldn't do it,
translation.zh: 那么多人说我们不可能成功

translation.en: which motivated us more.
translation.zh: 反而刺激了我们必胜的信心

translation.en: Ten down, including K2, five to go.
translation.zh: 包括乔戈里峰在内已经完成了十座山峰 还有五座

translation.en: No, four to go.
translation.zh: 不 还有四座

translation.en: -Make that correction, yeah? Four to go. -[climbers laughing]
translation.zh: 修改一下 好吗？还有四座

translation.en: Thirty-six hours later…
translation.zh: 36小时后

translation.en: …we were on the summit of Broad Peak.
translation.zh: （布洛阿特峰 8051米 11） 我们就登上了布洛阿特峰峰顶

translation.en: We are here, myself, Mingma David
translation.zh: 这其中包括我自己 明玛戴维

translation.en: and Halung Dorchi Sherpa.
translation.zh: 和哈隆多奇夏尔巴

translation.en: This will mark the end of second phase.
translation.zh: 这标志着第二阶段圆满结束

translation.en: We had summited the five highest mountains of Pakistan
translation.zh: 我们仅仅用了23天就完成了巴基斯坦境内

translation.en: in just 23 days.
translation.zh: 五座最高山峰的登顶

translation.en: I felt like I could do anything.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己无所不能

translation.en: -[Nims] Yes! Let's go! -[Mingma] Okay!
translation.zh: -好！我们出发吧！-好！

translation.en: [Nims] I am the Usain Bolt of 8,000 meters.
translation.zh: 我是八千米海拔的飞人

translation.en: Success!
translation.zh: 成功！

translation.en: No one can defeat me.
translation.zh: 没有人能打败我

translation.en: [Suchi] During the gap between Phase 2 and 3,
translation.zh: 在第二阶段和第三阶段之间

translation.en: Mum's health went downhill.
translation.zh: 妈妈的健康每况愈下

translation.en: She had a heart attack.
translation.zh: 她心脏病发作

translation.en: [Kamal] The doctor said she can go at any time.
translation.zh: 医生说她随时有可能离世

translation.en: It would be wise for you to call all your family here.
translation.zh: 你最好将所有家庭成员召集到这里

translation.en: [in Nepali] Our options are either do surgery or make her stable.
translation.zh: 我们可选择做手术 或者维持现状

translation.en: A lot of people have died on the surgery table.
translation.zh: （姐妹 安妮塔） 很多人都死在了手术台上

translation.en: From what I understand, Mum's chances of being revived are completely zero.
translation.zh: 根据我的了解妈妈恢复健康的可能性为零

translation.en: [Suchi] Eventually, the doctor said we can't operate on her
translation.zh: 最后医生也说不能给她做手术

translation.en: because she is so vulnerable.
translation.zh: 因为她的身体太弱了

translation.en: Nims is so close to his mum.
translation.zh: 尼姆斯和他妈妈的关系非常亲近

translation.en: If anything happens, the project is over.
translation.zh: 如果他妈妈发生了什么不好的事这个计划就会终止了

translation.en: [Nims] It was so tough.
translation.zh: 当时的情况太难了

translation.en: I just felt like I'm doing this inspiring, positive endeavor.
translation.zh: 我感觉 虽然我在努力做这个鼓舞人心、积极向上的事

translation.en: But as a son, I felt I had failed.
translation.zh: 但作为儿子 我觉得我是失败的

translation.en: I just said, "Don't lose your heart," you know?
translation.zh: 我只是说：“不要灰心

translation.en: "She is proud of you."
translation.zh: 她为你骄傲”

translation.en: It was a miracle.
translation.zh: 这是个奇迹

translation.en: She survived.
translation.zh: 她挺过来了

translation.en: [in Nepali] May God always protect you, my son.
translation.zh: 愿上帝永远保佑你 我的儿子

translation.en: Mum, don't worry about me.
translation.zh: 妈妈 不要为我担心

translation.en: -Continue to be more successful, my son. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 希望你越来越成功 我的儿子

translation.en: May the world recognize you.
translation.zh: 愿你能得到世界的广泛认可

translation.en: I'm going to summit the mountains, Mum.
translation.zh: 我会成功征服山峰的 妈妈

translation.en: [in English] I was touched so emotionally.
translation.zh: 我非常的感动

translation.en: I have another chance.
translation.zh: 我得到了另一个机会

translation.en: My mum said to me, "Nims, complete this for me."
translation.zh: 我的妈妈对我说：“尼姆斯 为我完成这个计划吧”

translation.en: [Suchi] The plan for Phase 3 was to summit Manaslu in Nepal first.
translation.zh: 第三阶段的计划是首先在尼泊尔登顶马纳斯卢峰

translation.en: And then to enter Tibet to climb Cho Oyu and Shishapangma.
translation.zh: 然后进入西藏攀登卓奥友峰和希夏邦马峰

translation.en: But nothing goes as planned on the mountains
translation.zh: 但实际上 在高海拔山峰上所有事都不会照计划发生

translation.en: which we should have known by then.
translation.zh: 这一点我们早就该了解到

translation.en: [Nims] We got two bits of bad news.
translation.zh: 我们得到了两个坏消息

translation.en: One, my permit request for Shishapangma has been rejected.
translation.zh: 第一个坏消息是我的希夏邦马峰登山许可申请被驳回了

translation.en: The Chinese government were saying the mountain is closed for this year.
translation.zh: 中国政府表示那年希夏邦马峰关闭

translation.en: Problem two, I was in the base camp of Manaslu,
translation.zh: 第二个坏消息是我在马纳斯卢峰大本营

translation.en: but Cho Oyu will be closed next week.
translation.zh: 但下周卓奥友峰将关闭

translation.en: I had to move fast.
translation.zh: 我必须快速行动

translation.en: There's no time for stopping, brother.
translation.zh: 没时间再等了 兄弟

translation.en: We're heading back to catch our flight,
translation.zh: 我们赶紧回去赶飞机

translation.en: so that we can enter Tibet by tomorrow evening.
translation.zh: 以便我们能在明晚抵达西藏

translation.en: [Suchi] Most people normally plan for one expedition,
translation.zh: 大多数人一般是制订一个探险计划

translation.en: but here we're planning for 14.
translation.zh: 而我们一下子规划了14次探险

translation.en: The logistics were very stressful.
translation.zh: 后勤准备压力很大

translation.en: [Nims] The vehicle can't go any further than this.
translation.zh: 这是车辆能够到达的最深处

translation.en: The deadline is running out of our hands,
translation.zh: 我们无法保证能在期限内完成任务

translation.en: and I could see how much pressure he's going through.
translation.zh: 我可以看出他压力有多大

translation.en: So, we are at the Cho Oyu base camp. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我们到达卓奥友峰大本营

translation.en: [Suchi] We were all worried about him.
translation.zh: 我们都为他担心

translation.en: Yeah, it's an absolute pleasure to be here on the summit of Cho Oyu.
translation.zh: 在卓奥友峰峰顶我们感到由衷的喜悦

translation.en: And, uh, in few days' time, I'll give you the summit of Manaslu.
translation.zh: 几天后 我们要登顶马纳斯卢峰

translation.en: [Suchi] For Nims as well, behind the scenes,
translation.zh: 对于尼姆斯来说 内心里

translation.en: his mum was on his mind.
translation.zh: 他也非常惦念他的妈妈

translation.en: It was a constant worry for him.
translation.zh: 他一直担心他妈妈

translation.en: [Nims] Standing on top of Manaslu, I was obviously happy.
translation.zh: 站在马纳斯卢峰峰顶从外表看我很开心

translation.en: But inside my chest…
translation.zh: 但在我的内心…

translation.en: I was feeling that it could be my last mountain.
translation.zh: 我觉得这有可能是我攀登的最后一座山峰

translation.en: [Chin] The one thing at this point that could stop Nims from finishing…
translation.zh: 此时 可能导致尼姆斯无法完成该计划的一个因素

translation.en: was access to the final mountain, Shishapangma.
translation.zh: 是最后一座山希夏邦马峰的访问权

translation.en: To any normal person,
translation.zh: 对于任何普通人

translation.en: the Chinese government giving you a hard no
translation.zh: 如果遭遇中国政府的严厉拒绝

translation.en: would be a moment to, you know, walk away.
translation.zh: 你会放弃

translation.en: [in Nepali] They have said no climbers are allowed on Shishapangma.
translation.zh: 他们拒绝任何登山者攀登希夏邦马峰

translation.en: But if it goes through a Nepali government official,
translation.zh: 但如果通过尼泊尔政府官员申请

translation.en: they may allow it.
translation.zh: 他们就有可能批准

translation.en: [Suchi] Nims was non-stop meeting politicians.
translation.zh: 尼姆斯不停地拜访政治家

translation.en: What can we do for humanity? To prove that power of possibility.
translation.zh: 我们能为人类做什么？证明可能性的力量

translation.en: The former prime minister.
translation.zh: 前总理

translation.en: Sir, as a Nepali, I thought of this project as this country's project.
translation.zh: 先生 作为一名尼泊尔人 我认为这个计划也是我们国家的计划

translation.en: But this could take four, five, six months.
translation.zh: 这可能需要4、5、6个月

translation.en: [Nims in English] This is for everyone here in this room.
translation.zh: 这个计划是为了今天在场的每个人

translation.en: Everyone who is in Nepal.
translation.zh: 为了每一个尼泊尔人

translation.en: I'm no one compared to the power of China.
translation.zh: 与中国政府的力量相比 我无足轻重

translation.en: But I was never gonna get fazed by that.
translation.zh: 但我也绝不会被此吓倒

translation.en: I took two routes.
translation.zh: 我有两个渠道

translation.en: One, the political process.
translation.zh: 一是政治程序

translation.en: The second was…
translation.zh: 二是…

translation.en: I asked my followers for help.
translation.zh: 我请求我的关注者提供帮助

translation.en: [Suchi] Many wrote to the Chinese government.
translation.zh: 很多人写信给中国政府 （马上就做 尼姆斯）

translation.en: From all over the world.
translation.zh: 全世界各地的朋友都行动了起来

translation.en: [Nims] I also started to get support from the mountaineering community.
translation.zh: （你是一名斗士拥有狮子般强大的心脏） 我也开始得到登山者群体的支持

translation.en: -Yeah! Hey, Nims. Conrad. -Jimmy. [laughs]
translation.zh: （康拉德安加：好耶！尼姆斯及团队 给这些人点正能量） -嗨 尼姆斯 我是康拉德-我是吉米 （登山运动员 康拉德安加）

translation.en: Shout-out to you, man. You've got Shishapangma.
translation.zh: 告诉你 哥们你得到了希夏邦马峰登山许可

translation.en: You're the man. Crush it.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 征服它

translation.en: It is a project not only for himself,
translation.zh: 这个计划不仅仅是为了他自己 （探险家 迈克霍恩）

translation.en: but for Nepal, for the Sherpas, for mountaineering.
translation.zh: 也是为了尼泊尔为了夏尔巴人 为了登山运动 （真正终结者）

translation.en: [Suchi] The Chinese government saw the whole world is supporting him.
translation.zh: 中国政府看到全世界都在支持他

translation.en: [Nims] Finally, the news came through that
translation.zh: 最终 我们收到了消息

translation.en: the Chinese were opening the mountain for me and my team.
translation.zh: 中国将为我和我的团队开放这座山

translation.en: One mountain to go.
translation.zh: 最后一座山了

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 让我们努力完成吧
